titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1547
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL1547

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

graphic.desc: By kind permission of British Museum

1.Now it is not per[tinent nor (obligatory) upon ... ... with respect to all] 2.documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and donations and wealth and [... ...] 3.Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinim and any [man, great] 4.or small, when Yahūyathaʿ bin of Bay[...] assumed office [… Ya]hūyathaʿ [...] the Maʾdhinites [... ...]. 5.(Nor) is it incumbent upon these (specific members) of Maʾdhinum, or their children, or their tribe of Maʾdhinum (at large), or their children, or [... ... their tribe] 6.of Maʾdhinum, with respect to those documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and [... ...] 7.Yahūyathaʿ of the (clan of) Kabīr-Khalīl, they of Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinum and [… … any] 8.[m]an, great or small, and from the period (of validity) and the benefits of those documents whenever [... ...].

Now it is not pertinent nor obligatory upon with respect to all
documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and donations and wealth and
Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinim and any man, great
or small, when Yahūyathaʿ bin of Bay... assumed office … Yahūyathaʿ ... the Maʾdhinites
.
Nor is it incumbent upon these specific members of Maʾdhinum, or their children, or their tribe of Maʾdhinum at large, or their children, or their tribe
of Maʾdhinum, with respect to those documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and
Yahūyathaʿ of the clan of Kabīr-Khalīl, they of Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinum and … … any
man, great or small, and from the period of validity and the benefits of those documents whenever
.

Now it is not pertinent nor obligatory upon with respect to all
documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and donations and wealth and
Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinim and any man, great
or small, when Yahūyathaʿ bin of Bay... assumed office … Yahūyathaʿ ... the Maʾdhinites .
Nor is it incumbent upon these specific members of Maʾdhinum, or their children, or their tribe of Maʾdhinum at large, or their children, or their tribe
of Maʾdhinum, with respect to those documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and
Yahūyathaʿ of the clan of Kabīr-Khalīl, they of Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinum and … … any
man, great or small, and from the period of validity and the benefits of those documents whenever .

Now it is not pertinent nor obligatory upon with respect to all
documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and donations and wealth and
Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinim and any man, great
or small, when Yahūyathaʿ bin of Bay... assumed office … Yahūyathaʿ ... the Maʾdhinites .
Nor is it incumbent upon these specific members of Maʾdhinum, or their children, or their tribe of Maʾdhinum at large, or their children, or their tribe
of Maʾdhinum, with respect to those documents and purchases and repayments and gifts and
Yahūyathaʿ of the clan of Kabīr-Khalīl, they of Maʾdhinum and their followers and the tribe of Maʾdhinum and … … any
man, great or small, and from the period of validity and the benefits of those documents whenever .
